This was a lovely farm stay about an hour drive outside of Da Lat. The host was kind enough to offer transport from Da Lat because the farm is hard to access via grab etc. The view was absolutely breathtaking and the room was perfect for what we needed - can cook simple meals in the kitchenette. The host offered us fresh fruit and avocado smoothies for free as well as did our laundry for us. They also offer home cooked meals per request and they made some of the best chicken wings I‚Äôve ever had. I highly recommend this stay for a peaceful getaway from the city.

Had a wonderful stay at Luu‚Äôs homestay! Very beautiful view of the mountain skyline and the place was way more stunning than I expected. It is quite far out from the city, but for a peaceful getaway, this is the perfect choice. I wish we had more time in the farmstay but unfortunately we were only in Dalat for 1 night. Everyone was so nice and friendly. The host‚Äôs sister was very welcoming and hospitable, she brought us out to a place where we could do a head spa since we wanted a massage and she even got us coconuts!

A perfect rural home stay. It is relatively isolated which is nice but it is also a farm‚Ä¶and that means the whole package of doggies barking and people coming and going‚Ä¶it‚Äôs realistic, not a pampered escape into nature.
The views from the room are breathtaking, and I want to be adopted by the family. Everyone is so friendly and thoughtful. An unforgettable stay. I will be back!

Was a beautiful stay. So peaceful to get out of the city and just chill. We loaded up on supplies before we left. So we could cook for ourselves. Full kitchen. Hot plate. Full size fridge. They did have a bbq that was on coals. On request. Stoke your own fire. Super awesome. They have mopeds to rent. It‚Äôs a short trip down the hill to the market. Groceries. Coffee shops. Etc. there are a few beautiful waterfalls to check out and a monastery that‚Äôs definitely worth a look. Highly recommended.
Although you are on a farm way out there. Be prepared for heavy rains, and some serious mozy‚Äôs. Bed has a nice mozzy net so you can sleep peacefully.
Oh and the view is amazing !!

The farm was a lovely retreat, and I found the hosts very warm and relaxed. It was great to be able to use the scooters and the unit was comfortable and self contained. I can recommend this place 100%. Cheers.

This place is amazing, the view and air quality play so nicely together, it's spectacular. The host is also very nice, responsive and helpful.
If you're looking for a unique and peaceful place I can highly recommend this place and the host.

We had an amazing 10-night stay, breathtaking views, beautiful place, and really friendly people.
Van also gave us a lot of snacks, tea, and small meals during the stay, which we really appreciated and would have happily paid or tipped for.
The only issue was that right before leaving, we got handed a surprise bill with charges that were never mentioned before:
We were given a motorbike without any talk of a price. It wasn't even a proper rental (shared when others needed it, and in poor condition) but we were charged 720,000 VND for it, which felt very unfair.
A 100,000 VND "caf√©" charge showed up too, we were never told there was a cost nd we heard previous guests hadn‚Äôt been charged for it.
It‚Äôs a shame, because we loved the place and the people, but the surprise bill and unreasonable bike charge left a bad taste.
Future guests should be aware of this and ask about prices.
Clean, nice people and a beautiful great view, definitely recommended. We enjoy our stay a lots.
Very peaceful. Host invited me to the neighbors house for International Women's Day party and let me rent her motorbike to explore the area. 10/10

Recently I had the pleasure of staying with an incredible host! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality that made me feel right at home.
The atmosphere was incredibly welcoming, and my host went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. They provided helpful tips on local attractions and made sure I had everything I needed.
One of the highlights of my stay was the breathtaking view from the property. The scenery was simply stunning and added a magical touch to my experience. Thank you üòäüëçüôè

We had a wonderful stay!
A bit outside the city in very picturesque surroundings, the room was comfortable. The very best about a great stay was the company - we had an amazing time communicating via translate, laughing and eating delicious food. When we had a hard time getting the scooter we borrowed down a steep hill, we instantly got help into easier terrain. Recommend for anyone who is willing to stay a bit out of the way. Thank you again for an unforgettable stay - we hope to be back again someday!
very nice place, but need to be avare that sometimes it's cold there.  shorts and shirt not the best idea. But the place and host is super nice. Fire in the evening was nice.

We stayed for 10 days and loved it! Luu's family is adorable and very generous, make you feel part of the family right away and always bring you treats from the farm or kitchen ‚ù§Ô∏è The view is amazing and the rental very comfortable and spacious. They helped us with arrival and departure what made our travels very easy. It was the perfect place for us to unwind, get some work done and enjoy a peaceful environment with a lovely family. Highly recommend and hope we will be back one day!

Parfait!! Accueil amical dans un cadre charmant. Nous voulions nous reposer en dehors des sentiers touristiques et √ßa a √©t√© une r√©ussite. La vue est splendide, au calme. Les h√¥tes sont √† l‚Äô√©coute, tr√®s g√©n√©reux et prennent le temps de nous aider si besoin. On recommande +++

Quynh's place is nice, cozy and comfortable with great views and beautiful places to explore nearby. Her parents and grandparents are beautiful people. I was worried about communication but that was a breeze because one, there wasn't much need for it and two they used the translation app which was great. Once I had to change my plans for the day and get back earlier due to heavy rain - I was in Da Lat during peak rainy season - and asked Quynh if there were any places nearby to get some lunch. Within 30 mins there was a gorgeous platter of 3 course home cooked meal!
I had a great experience and will recommend this place to others.

Had the most amazing time, such a beautiful place to stay. Hosts are so kind and friendly/ welcoming. Definitely a place to stay if you want to escape the busy city.
They also invite you to have food with them and talk with them which leads to such an authentic experience. 1000/10 would recommend.
We only wish we could have stayed longer but unfortunately they were booked out for the rest of dates we wanted to stay , and I see why they are booked out!
If your thinking of staying in this area don‚Äôt look any where else you won‚Äôt regret staying here. My only advice is even tho they cook food for you , bring snacks or other foods you would want to eat as it‚Äôs quite far from local shops or restaurants, they have a hob cooker you can use in the room if you wanted to cook for your self.

This was one of my most memorable stay in Vietnam. From the moment I arrived, the family made me feel like part of their own. Their warmth and hospitality were unmatched, and I truly felt at home. it‚Äôs the host‚Äôs family that made my time staying there unforgettable.
the property has spectacular view to watch sunset and sunrise. if you love nature, It is a perfect location to get away from busy city for relaxation. in addition, there are 2 dogs and 2 cats on the property that will come to say hi and follow you around. i was lucky to be able to stay at the farm on New Year time, where i learned how to make new year‚Äôs cake and watched¬†incredible firework display¬†from the backyard with the host‚Äôs family and fellows that also stay at the farm. i‚Äôm grateful to be able to get invited to experience many traditional things while staying here.
If you‚Äôre looking for a place with a¬†breathtaking view, a welcoming atmosphere, and hosts who treat you like family, this is it.

This was one of my favorite experiences in Vietnam. The farm is so peaceful and beautiful with amazing views. The whole family is incredibly kind and helpful! Even though we spoke different languages, the google translate conversations were nice. And also time spent with smiles and quietly being are sometimes the most profound communications.
The two family dogs are always ready to be your friend at meal time, and if they get to know you, will even stop by to say hello just to be friendly! Since I didn‚Äôt want to drive a motorbike in the mountains, a neighbor and one of the family members took me to a waterfall nearby one day. And we even made maki rolls which was fun!
If you want some peace and quiet, time to yourself to sit and be, with lovely people around, in a nice comfortable room with amazing views in nature, I highly recommend this spot!

Please read thoroughly the instructions from the owner, as the location is far from center, you should prepare enough drinks and food depending on how long you stay, but it is an excellent place if you looking for private space with gorgeous sunrise and Mountain View.
And the owner very helpful for booking transportation and taking good care if you needed.

First and foremost, the place is very beautiful and unique!
It‚Äôs super secluded, private and surreal.
Never seen a place as cool and special as this on Airbnb.
The host too was super responsive, helpful and understanding.
Something the host failed to mention is about the insects and animals that you might find in the apartment.
We are quite a chill couple so we cleaned it ourselves and dealt with whatever inconveniences (ie. Tons of ants in the bathroom, a cute frog üê∏, some lizards).
But the host was super responsive throughout, offered solutions in the sense of moving to one of his other apartments, refunded a hefty amount of the price and was friendly and thoughtful on every interaction.

Breathtaking view and beautiful & thoughtful place. Amazing if you want to take some time off by yourself. The village is cute, especially the locals close to the apartment make you feel very welcomed.

We had a great stay at this location. Its a bit difficult to reach but once you are there, you want to stay for longer.
We really enjoyed our stay here. The location was beautiful and the sunrises were magnificent. Just keep in mind that there are lots of insects in the area.

What sets Tho Non Garden Cloudy Ocean View apart is its serene and uncrowded atmosphere. Unlike more popular tourist spots, this hill allows you to fully immerse yourself in the peaceful surroundings without the distraction of large crowds. It‚Äôs a perfect spot for meditation, reflection, or simply enjoying the beauty of nature.

The real magic begins at dawn. Arriving early, you witness the sunrise casting a golden glow over the horizon, illuminating the sea of clouds below. The sight is nothing short of breathtaking. The clouds, gently swirling around the hilltop, create an ethereal landscape that feels almost otherworldly. It‚Äôs a photographer's paradise, with endless opportunities to capture the perfect shot.

Tho Non Garden is a must-visit destination for nature enthusiasts and anyone seeking a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Its unique charm and breathtaking views will leave you with memories to cherish for a lifetime.

What a beautiful place, we were lucky to come here after the rain and then saw the rainbow, the scene was very peaceful and like being somewhere fantacy. When I woke up early in the morning and looked out the window at a sea of ‚Äã‚Äãclouds waiting for me, this was a moment that I will remember forever. Besides, the owner supported us very enthusiastically, giving us specific instructions to find a house. The path is not difficult but a bit steep, but when I reach the place where I can see the whole city in the distance, I find it completely reasonable. There are many restaurants about 3km from where we live, but if you are lazy and don't want to go anywhere, there are people who can buy food for you (for a fee).

The apartment has a truly stunning view ‚Äî absolutely breathtaking! The host was incredibly helpful, assisting me with renting a vehicle and always responding very quickly. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Da Lat!

Our stay at this place in Dalat was absolutely fantastic! From the moment we booked until the end of our 4-day stay, the service was truly amazing.
Our host was incredibly proactive and responsive, always quick to answer all of our questions, which made our trip planning and our time there so much smoother and more enjoyable. And the view from the balcony ‚Äì wow! It was simply breathtaking and provided the perfect backdrop for our mornings and evenings.
We had a great stay and highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting Dalat. Thank you for your exceptional hospitality!

Nice place to stay. Indeed. Beautiful view as seen as in the picture. Super worthy. The admin in the mart named Tahd is cute and really helpful. Also, Baileys as the host is really responsive from the day we booked the unit until we check out.

The Stardome Apartment is absolutely charming‚Äîcozy, beautifully designed, and offers a stunning view. Having a mart conveniently located in the same building was a huge plus. The bathtub was a highlight‚Äîperfect for relaxing after a long day. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Friendly host & staff. The view also stunning from our room. We also Having nice breakfast at local restaurant near to the apartment.

Stardome Dalat, true to its name, is a very cozy place to stay with amazing view of endless pine forest and even a little bit of wind turbines from Cau Dat. Everything is clean, aesthestic with basic amenties that should make you feel right at home. The location is the cherry on top as you are a few steps away from markets and cafes, a good centre place before getting start on your Dalat trip. The host is also passionate, friendly and very supportive with my requests, and I will be looking forward to stay here again next time.

There are definitely a few issue while we were there like the hot water for the beautiful tub because the building is still under a bit of finishing up construction but Loc was so proactive and got it fixed so we can use it and got us a hammock for the balcony to enjoy the amazing views and cool breezes for the inconvenience.  His  restaurant also had great fresh food and amazing drinks when we had the privilege to dine in because of the rain.  We ended up extending our stay there because of the whole experience.  Co Tam was also super nice!  Visit and enjoy.
Amazing place to spend a weekend, very peaceful and clean place. The balcony and the mountain view is fantastic

We rly wanted to like this place but there were a few factors that contributed to this rating. Nonetheless, would first like to highlight that host was very responsive and the room had beautiful views of Dalat. We also received complementary yogurt :) Now to the reasons for this rating.
We got our room swopped from this to room 4.2 when we arrived as they informed us that 4.1 was still being cleaned. That was still ok as it was kinda an upgrade to having 2 queen beds. However, upon entering, the room smelled musty and the floor was still wet (perhaps from cleaning).
The water pressure and temp was finicky, in order to get hot water you‚Äôd have to lower the pressure, causing water flow to be small. The toilet also constantly smelled stale despite opening the window.
The biggest reason why we gave a low rating was the bed had a lot of small bugs, resulting in a lot of bites. We tried to kill what we could but they somehow kept coming back. Hence the hygiene is questionble.. :(

Honestly, I had doubts when I booked Bailey's place. it has been years since I've been to Da Lat so I didn't really know what to expect.
First off, room. Amazing, views are to die for.
Toilet is kinda small (I'm plus sized) but it gets the job done.
It can get warm in the noon but the fan provided helped alot.
Location: Decently good with food spots and cafes around. Closer to the lake/central than it seems.
Insects - Room was clear of insects just maybe a few tiny ones. When you chill at the balcony, there will be but hey you are in Da Lat so don't complain bout this.
One thing for certain is that you will enjoy your stay. Host has a convenience store and a restaurant in the building so it really helped when you just wanna stay in and not go out.
I will definately be back!
Best host, best place, amazing comfort. Nothing like it! Highly recommend and i look forward to going back again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

if you're an animal lover, don't come here. she keeps baby monkeys in small cages as some kind of entertainment. also : they serve BBQ for 600 000 dong, the meat was not good at all and that is an insane price for food in Vietnam.
I really hope she takes away the monkey's and asks normal prices for the

Pros:
1-Beautifully appointed retreat, serene location, quiet surroundings, lovely Koi fish pond with soothing waterfall, many shaded common picnic areas to relax and enjoy the views.
2-Responsive and helpful host.
3-Functional & clean shared kitchen.
4-Easy to reach (if you have a vehicle, due to a partly muddy road leading to resort).
5-Good water pressure in shower (hot available).
6-Aesthetically designed room, with wood crafted furniture, blackout curtains.
7-Great wifi connectivity.
Cons:
1-Room Window view largely obstructed by trees planted right in front of cottage, unlike the photos in listing.
2-Photos in listing included pics of other differently appointed rooms, some with balconies. Listing pics should be specific to room being advertised.
3-Mattress is quite firm.
4-Taxis are not readily available in roads..taxi booking is required (to/from resort), need the host help to arrange it due to language barrier and it‚Äôs relatively expensive (from main road to resort 200k).
We were so excited of this place. A nice view, a big territory, very peaceful. Also there a great restaraunt with a fantastic view too.

A must-go place for someone who love the nature as the way it is and enjoy peaceful time of your life. It's not a tourist spot, it's just simply a piece of heaven on earth. Great view, nice and friendly host. You can go with Futa bus and ask for their transportation directly to the place. Don't forget to ask the owner prepare for 1 BBQ night. Everything is amazing. Deffinately going back here again and again.
Eni place is one of the best that I have been. View of mountain, cloud hoovering below the river, just perfect. The place is superbly designed with huge garden, bbq place.
Beautiful scenery and extremely quiet. Great for a weekend away or as a stop between HCMC and Da Lat
A lovely piece of paradise in the midst of nature. We really enjoyed our stay and the amazing barbecue that they arranged for us. Thank you for everything!
It is an absolute dream location with a stunning view when you‚Äôre looking for a quite place which still has good access!

Det var en helt fantastisk oplevelse. Omgivelserne var s√• smukke!! Og selve stedet er bare fantastisk. Menneskerne var s√• s√∏de, og hj√¶lpsomme!!
Alt var bare helt magisk!! S√• dejligt roligt!!
Ville 110% anbefale, hvis man leder efter et stille og roligt sted, med god mad og gode mennesker.

This place really touched our soul. I have never experienced a place where I instantly felt so safe and welcome. They helped us with everything, they showed so much interest in us and the meals they made us were incredible. It‚Äôs located in a magical surrounding. You hear crickets, frogs, water sounds and the wind. The view from the bed is amazing and we woke up happy every morning. This is the kind of place you come back for. We‚Äôre travelling Vietnam for 4 weeks and we only stayed here for 3 nights but I wish we booked more days here. Even the animals there are so gentle. They have dogs and cats and they are so calm and friendly and want cuddles all day.
It felt like a big family, they interact with you but they also give you so much space for your own time and moments to enjoy the place and the beautiful nature.
We also did a tea ceremony with the woman who created this place. That was also very special.
If I ever come back to visit Vietnam I would love to come back. It‚Äôs lovely.

Beautiful view. Location good Feel like living among locals. Good recommendation for restaurants and driver. Beware of narrow elevator and last flight of stairs if you don‚Äôt travel light. water in shower either too hot or cold. Best to use tub. Very responsive.

Definitely more choices for this budget. Just a reminder, what you would pay here is for the view only not the overall experience. I need to take my partner out 1 night before because of that.

We enjoyed our stay at this Airbnb. The views from the bedroom, bathroom and living area were beautiful and it was such a lovely view to wake up to. The flat has everything you need and is well located for getting out and about around Dalat. The curtains in the bedroom did mean some light fed into the room, however, the host has advised that this is due to be fixed goingforward.

Stunning view. Amazing panorama sunrise view! 24 hours open convinces store and Korean restaurant downstairs. Location is good to go everywhere.
The stairs at the entrance are so steep that it may be difficult to climb with large luggage. But it‚Äôs worth to stay to see beautiful view.
Overall I really enjoyed to stay 3 nights here. Baileys is nice and responsive guy.

Baileys place was stunning, beautiful views over Da Lat. In a peaceful area but very easy to get into town by Grab.
He helped us check in early and was very helpful the whole time!

Bailey and team is superb and responsive aside from daily recommendations if we needed any help they will always be there to help.
The location is easy to find on grab as well

This is a great find if you want to live a bit away from the city centre and yet have a great valley view to start your morning with!
The host is responsive and welcoming along with the staff at the cafe below!
The only issue would be the hot/cold shower which makes it difficult to take a bath in a cold setup..
I would definitely recommend this place for friends Or family.. This place has stairs , so older people with issues in their knees can avoid!

While scrolling through my airbnb lists to find the right place to stay I stumbled upon this location. First time for a while a place that was actually matched the description. Communication was very professional and responsive for any questions that I ran into. I highly suggest this place for anyone to stay if you are looking for a peaceful stay with a stunning view.

Great stay. Very nearby center of Dalat. They have a convenience store and restaurants in the same complex

We had high hopes for this stay, as it was the one spot on our trip where we chose to splurge a little. Unfortunately, the feeling we got upon arrival didn‚Äôt quite match what was conveyed in the photos. While the view from the apartment was truly spectacular, the space itself felt like it needed more care and ongoing maintenance.
That said, Bailey Ho was extremely professional, responsive, and quick to act once we voiced our concerns. He offered us the option to move to another apartment for the night and even provided a partial refund ‚Äî more than what we had requested. Ultimately, we chose to relocate to a different accommodation, but we truly appreciated how sincerely Bailey took our feedback and how promptly he worked to make things right.
Overall, while the space itself didn‚Äôt meet our expectations, the host‚Äôs handling of the situation was exemplary.

Amazing stay! The place was exactly as described ‚Äî clean, stylish, and comfortable. The host was incredibly responsive and provided great recommendations. The location was perfect, close to everything we needed. Would definitely stay here again.

Overall, I really enjoyed the stay. The view from the apartment was absolutely stunning ‚Äî truly the highlight of the place.
There are just a few downsides to mention. The elevator was quite small and a bit inconvenient, especially when carrying luggage. Additionally, to reach the room, you have to climb some stairs with your bags, which might be difficult for some guests. A refrigerator was also missing, which would have been useful.
The place was generally nice, though it felt a bit dusty ‚Äî as if the floors hadn‚Äôt been cleaned thoroughly. I would also suggest improving the quality of the slippers. They were old and worn out; new disposable slippers would make a big difference.
That said, I would probably stay here again, mainly because the view is just breathtaking. With a few small improvements, this place could be perfect.
Best place at dalat only few km to go market and near house every thing is available..over all recommend host is also responsible
Amazing view and very responsive host, would recommend if you want to stay just slightly outside of dalat city centre where it‚Äôs more peaceful

I have a good experience, and the host is friendly & supporty. The room I stay has a great view to Dalat's farm, and the bed is quite clean & comfortable.
Great place, responsive host. Home was a little bit far from center and convenience stores but a great stay with a nice view.

The couple was a great host from the moment we arrived until the time we leave. Felt in love with nature and the family dogs üê∂ were a bonus during the entire stay. We want to hide and stay away from busy life and this was the perfect quiet place for it. Love the view from my room also.

A true little piece of paradise !
The accommodation is beautiful, perfectly nestled in nature, with a breathtaking view. An ideal place to relax and recharge. But what makes the experience even more special are the hosts: incredibly kind and caring. They live just next door, always available without being intrusive, and their hospitality is simply amazing.
Unfortunately, I was sick during my stay, and they took care of me with such kindness and generosity. I can only highly recommend this magical place and these wonderful hosts. A huge thank you for everything !

Tuyen will do all he can to make sure you have a great stay. The property is located within his grounds and is beautiful. You have to remember you are in nature's garden, so expect bugs and insects. The views are phenomenal and they are both very hospitable. We arrived earlier than check in and were allowed to check in early. We were then helped with getting into town. The tea and the coffee are beautiful and made fresh by Tuyen. We had a homemade breakfast, which was a nice mix of bread and salad (which cost 200k for 2 people). The dogs on site are beautiful and friendly. Tuyen showed us his coffee farm, which is beautiful, we went and saw the clouds up there the following morning.
All in all a nice and quiet place to stay, I would highly recommend going and enjoying their hospitality.
We were very happy to stay in a quiet picturesque place, the owner speaks English - they offered us dinner and were ready to provide any assistance

Mr. Tuyen and his wife are truly wonderful hosts. We felt just like home during our stay. They were so kind and lovely. The place is surrounded by mountains and nature, and the room was spacious and clean. We would definitely come back again if we have the chance. Thank you, Mr. Tuyen and your wife, for all the kindness you showed us‚Äîespecially to my son.

Hele mooie omgeving in de natuur met mooi uitzicht, fijne koele temperatuur. Een escape van de drukte en uitlaatgassen van de grote stad. Genoten van heerlijk ontbijt van verse producten uit hun eigen tuin.
Echter wel ver van Dalat, met grab >30 minuten. Vanaf het entree van terrein moet je een lang stuk lopen over een stijle weg met je bagage naar de kamer. Gecombineerd met regen is dit pad heel glad.
Maar Tuyen en zijn vrouw zijn zeer vriendelijk en doen hun best om je verblijf aangenaam te maken. Als je rust wil is deze plek een aanrader!

Such a communicative, lovely and friendly family! We had a super stay thanks to them. The bungalows have floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking greenery everywhere and a rushing stream. Each bungalow has two floors with one room each - the upper has two beds and the lower has one bed - both rooms have superb views. The rooms have some bugs because you are right in the middle of a beautiful green jungle. You can also hang out at the open cafe space to get some delicious homemade coffee from their farm. They can also make you some homemade healthy food (it‚Äôs a bit pricey for Da Lat) but there are no restaurants around the area, and plus we enjoyed the interaction. The area overall is so peaceful. They have planted lots of flowers, coffee plants and new plants all around the property which is so nice. The best part is the family (including doggies!). They are so responsive and friendly and so happy to share their experiences with you. We really enjoyed talking to them. Thank you so much!

We had such an amazing stay at Ngoc‚Äôs Farm‚Äôily! Ngoc was such a lovely host and made us feel very welcome.The tiny home was beautiful, clean and had everything you needed. It was in a very peaceful location - not too far from the hustle and bustle of Da Lat but still felt nestled away in your own little sanctuary. Ngoc provided us with great recommendations for food and drink around us - we frequented some places more than once! Also had very sweet dogs on the property that loved some pats. Definitely recommend staying here and would 100% return for another stay in Vietnam!

Hmmm, this was the very first homestay I booked when I came to Da Lat. And it surprised me by its warmth, by the view. Just like its name, a small cozy garden, cool breeze, quiet space, hidden gently among pine hills.
The host was kind and gentle, she gave me a warm welcome, softly. She helped me a lot with a little trouble I had, I think she truly deserves an extra star for that.
This was the most beautiful room in the whole place. If you come in the right season, when the persimmons are ripe, you may find the stay even more lovely.
Thank you, truly, for welcoming me like that.

though the room is a bit cold, and the bathroom is more ‚Äúnatural‚Äù than modern, the cleaness is good and overall I like this place.

We loved staying here. Very peaceful and the room looks just like the photos. A small space but has everything you need. There‚Äôs no AC but as Dalat is slightly cooler and the room is built to stay cool, you don‚Äôt need it.
Ngoc was really helpful and super responsive if we needed anything.
We‚Äôd definitely stay again if ever we‚Äôre back in Dalat!
Thanks :)

This place is an absolute gem! Everything was spotless, beautifully decorated, and incredibly cozy. The hostess is the kindest and most welcoming person ‚Äî she made us feel at home from the very first moment. The atmosphere is magical: peaceful, charming, and full of heart. We even got to pick fresh strawberries right on the property ‚Äî they were unbelievably delicious and natural. We truly couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better stay. Without a doubt, we will be coming back here again. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a perfect getaway!

The room is cute and I loved the plants placed in the bathroom. The host made sure our stay is comfortable and gave us great recommendation about places to eat and visit. There are cafes at walkable distance and most of touristy places are close to it. Would love to visit again!

Ngoc was an amazing host and always fast to respond anytime we messaged her. She allowed us to keep our room until we got picked up to leave dalat which worked out very well for us. The place was cozy and peaceful, highly recommend staying here!

I love every bits about this place. Very cosy and peaceful.
They have two dogs and they are very very friendly.
Host also very friendly and sweet.
I had a pleasant stay.

This was my last homestay in Da Lat and one of the most memorable. The room was clean, cozy, and mosquito-free, with unique lighting and windows, feel like living in a warm little cave surrounded by trees. I wish I could‚Äôve stayed longer.
The location is great, next to Bao Dai Palace 3 and close to Crazy House. The host shared a wonderful Google Maps guide of local caf√©s, bar and restaurants, with personal notes for each spot(which is so cute) . Thanks to her, I found some hidden gems, especially the amazing street-side canel√© stall.
Highly recommended for both comfort and care!

The tiny home on Ngoc‚Äôs farm stay ist very lovely, located on a hill close to town. The bathroom gives a tropical feel hence to plants inside and outside with a nice view. It‚Äôs only a short Grab ride into town.
On the farm, there are two very friendly dogs. Unfortunately, they were barking for the better part of the two nights we stayed there. So we didn‚Äôt get a lot of sleep.
The bed was not made for tall people since it is quite short. Also, there are a lot of mosquitos but Ngoc supplied us with some good mosquito repellent.

I loved staying in such a unique wooden cabin! It was quiet and private with well kept gardens and beautiful trees. The two dogs are very gentle and welcomed me every time I returned. Cafes and restaurants are within walking distance and I enjoyed the walk down the hill into the main city area.

We had a wonderful stay at Tre House! The place was incredibly charming and peaceful, and is exactly the relaxing getaway we were looking for. The garden is absolutely beautiful, and both the room and shared spaces were thoughtfully decorated. The fireplace kept us warm and was the perfect way to end the day.
Moreover, our host was great! He was very kind, helpful, and attentive to all our needs. He responded quickly to our questions and made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay. We truly appreciated his hospitality and care.
Thoroughly enjoyed our time here and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful retreat.

This place has a breathtaking view, smooth check-in & check-out process, the room is relaxing, Baileys was very responsive to us. This apartment was beautiful. The scenery was stunning. It was located in a very nice area around 15 minutes outside of night market. The surrounding area was very clean and the 24/7 mart under was perfect and the staff were amazing. They also have a restaurant right under that serves amazing hotpot. If I ever come back to da lat I will be staying at this apartment again.

Our stay here was the highlight of our entire trip to Vietnam. The room offered a stunning mountain view, so peaceful and relaxing. We truly wish we could have stayed longer, and we‚Äôll definitely return one day. The host was incredibly helpful and friendly, making our experience even more memorable.

It is a great stay in Da Lat, beautiful view and lovely people. Bailyes and his team are extremely helpful and replies are always prompt. If you're looking for a place to stay in Da Lat, Stardome is an amazing option and I'll definitely be back!

To say that the view was beautiful is an understatement! This is to date our favourite apartment so far, waking up to such a gorgeous view. Thanks Baileys and his team for also being so responsive, helping us to feel comfortable and at home in Da Lat! Would love to come back again!

A lovely place! The view is just phenomenal, such a joy to wake up to.
The host, Bailey, is super friendly and very quick to respond. He accommodated an early check-in for us which was so helpful after travelling for so long.
You are housed above a 24/7 convenience store with attentive and kind staff. Great stay :)
It‚Äôs a 10-15min grab bike from the city centre so not a problem at all, and super worth it for the view! Plenty of cafes and restaurants nearby as well.

Wished we could have stayed more nights to fully enjoy this experience. We got lost finding the location but Quoc Kh√°nh was super nice to personally find and bring us to the right location. We even had a welcome yogurt from them! Space is overall clean to use but just a note that there are a lot of ants on the balcony area where the plants are, however it does not affect us. Great that there's a fan in case it gets too stuffy or hot! Communication between Baileys, Quoc Kh√°nh and us is easy and great as they are very responsive! Would recommend and I would come back :)

The view is just gorgeous! The apartment has a big nice balcony, where you can easily sit and relax. The bed is spacious and comfortable. A good hairdryer üëçüèª
There‚Äôs a Korean restaurant on the second floor and a 24/7 convenience store (you can hear the music from downstairs in the room, however it stops at 10pm - it won‚Äôt bother you, just take a note). The host is extremely responsive and friendly.
Great location - there‚Äôs a motorbike rental, a laundry and some cafes and bars nearby.

We had a wonderful stay there. I really love the room - relaxation! The host was helpful and friendly. There is a 24/7 convenient store and a restaurant. Food was good - In case you need something to fix your belly or it‚Äôs a rainy day.
Communication with the host was super easy and he was very proactive and solution-orientated. We felt very welcome & really enjoyed our stay. What I enjoyed the most was the amazing view :)

When I say that Baileys Ho's was one the best experienced Air BnB in my life I am not kidding.

was almost 2.5 km away from city centre which was quite reasonable to take a walk.

it was good. great view, responsive hosts. very nice people. The only slight flaws is that the bathroom is a little small. Aside from that, it's all great!

I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay. I‚Äôm already looking forward to coming back next time!

One of the best air bnbs I have stayed at.
Location amazing.

Amazing host and very helpful.
Will return soon :)
Reallly beautiful place, great view. Warm water was readily available.

My stay at Ivy Coffee Farm Airbnb in Vietnam was an absolute delight! This cozy cottage exceeded my expectations with its incredible value for money. A location surrounded by nature, kind hosts, cute children and animals.
Before staying here, I stayed in the centre of Dalat and it is a completely different world.
This is the perfect place to get a feel for local life.
Meals and coffee prepared by the wife are available as an option and are recommended for all guests.
It's a very thoughtful touch and makes the guest's trip even more special.
If you can ride a motorbike, I highly recommend renting one.
Your host will take you to the rental location.
It's fun to get up early and buy breakfast at the local market.
Visiting the surrounding waterfalls is a bit of an adventure.
If you want the real experience, you should definitely visit.
Thank you for the wonderful days:)

A Serene Retreat in the Coffee Garden
My stay at Ivy Coffee Farm's charming wooden house was truly unforgettable. Nestled amidst coffee garden, the cozy cabin with local rustic charm was built by the host himself, with great attention to detail.
The warm hospitality, flavorful home-cooked meals, their friendly daughter and adorable dog & cat made me feel right at home.
The host also took great pride in roasting fresh coffee beans, and the aroma that always filled the air. The taste of the coffee was rich and satisfying, perfect for the surroundings.
Highly recommended for either groups or solo travelers, you won't be disappointed.

We love the house and also the neighborhood.
Thank you!
An amazing experience, a quaint place that puts you into Vietnamese living. This cabin is rustic, open air, and extremely engaging to the senses.

Possibly the most peaceful three weeks of my life. Absolutely loved the place. It was absolutely serene, and the family made me feel right at home. The home cooked meals were absolutely wonderful.
If you're looking for a quiet place to slow down and reflect, you could not ask for a better setting than this one. Beautiful home in the hills with stunning scenery on all sides. Incredible hiking as long as you can handle some serious elevation change.
And the wifi and cell reception are great for those moments when you do need to leave the bubble.

We loved every minute here. During our stay of 5 days, we honestly hardly left the cabin. It was so cozy to wake up with the mountain view, enjoy a coffee and just relax! The family brought little snacks once in a while and if needed also dinner. We went to the supermarket twice, the family can drive you to the town, if needed. 2 evenings we spent with the family with some Bbq and it was so nice ‚ù§Ô∏è They are making an effort to communicate with the translator and it works quite well. We loved it here and already miss drinking coffee on the balcony!

A beautiful stay in the mountains with a wonderful view. The family made me feel right at home, was very friendly, and accommodating. I had a private studio to myself with a private kitchen, tho their meals were delicious and convenient; they brought right to my door. I rented their motorbike and had fun exploring the surrounding area. At night there was occasionally noise from neighbors‚Äô music and karaoke but it wasn‚Äôt the hosts fault. I would recommend this was a nice way to see the countryside.

Ik zocht een rustig plekje om te werken en dit was perfect. Priv√© hutje bovenaan de heuvel, met tweepersoonsbed, een keukentje en een badkamer. Roffelende stortregens op het dak elke middag (regentijd) en verder totale rust. Het uitzicht is zo mooi als in de foto's. Fantastische gastheer en gastvrouw. Zij kookt heerlijke maaltijden voor je, zo vaak als je wilt. Er is vers fruit en andere lekkere hapjes. De kleindochters wonen daar ook en doen je hart meteen smelten. Was graag langer gebleven.

This was my one of my all-time favorite Airbnbs. It was much more beautiful than what I had expected. I arrived when I was under stress and going through a bit of a dip, but when I left, I felt like a new person. I stayed from middle May to middle June. The weather was great- in the Goldielocks zone.
But what made it so special were the people and nature. Fireflies at night, hiking in the mountain, the view over the valley and the beautiful blue skies... it was magical. I got treated almost every day by the hosts.
They brought me fruits and smoothies without me ever asking. I took the scooter out once a week and it was cheap and reliable. I would recommend this place highly and will return next year!
Thanks so much for everything.

My friend and I had such a wonderful time at this cozy homestay about 30km outside of Dalat. The surrounding area is gorgeous, with fruit trees, a river, mountains, and quiet village streets. The family is so kind and welcoming. I felt like I was at home, even though I stayed just one night. I would happily stay again.

Thanks for the lovely stay!
We had a great time, escaping the city noise, enjoying the grand view and exploring the nature around. The place is great for longer stays, as long as you are good with the scooter/motorbikes.
We built ourselves some standing desks on the Balcony and had a productive time with some amazing Human connections. When you come here you have the chance to enter a community of amazing, heartfelt and and open people that meet up for an Artclub in one of the amazing local caf√©s that are also great for working.
The family that runs the farm is extremely kind and welcoming! They share their home grown fruits, homemade smoothies and all sorts of other Vietnamese dishes with you.
When we got sick they even drove us to a nearby doctor, when we were in the woods when it got dark they called to make sure we are ok, and generally it feels very safe at the farm up on the hill.
Once again thank your for the wonderful stay! <3

This Airbnb is simply amazing. From the moment I arrived, Lu‚Äôu Quynh‚Äôs mother, Ms. Van, made me feel at home. She‚Äôs incredibly welcoming, cheerful, and generous, her food is delicious, and we would have great conversations using Google Translate.
Her husband is just as kind and helpful‚Äîhe even rescued me when I got lost in the nearby mountains! Honestly, the family did everything they could to make sure I have the best possible stay.
The place itself is just as gorgeous as in the pictures. The views are stunning, and the only thing I would hear is the sound of nature‚Äîpure peace and quiet.
The studio had everything I needed: conformable bed, full equipped kitchen, a beautiful terrace, a desk, a bathroom, etc.
I really hope to come back someday. Next time, I‚Äôll make sure to learn how to ride a motorbike beforehand, since that‚Äôs the main way to get around here. That said, the family was always happy to give me a ride.
Thank you so much, Ms. Van and family.

Firstly definitely coming back
I had no idea what to expect and i ended up loving it. The atmosphere is great, the energy is great. I loved feeling like i was part of the family. So many unexpected things mostly wonderful and it was exactly what i was looking for: a more authentic experience of Vietnam.
I loved being away from everything. I loved the daily food, and delivered to your door or sit and eat looking out over the hillsü§Ø
Internet great for work. But also great just to explore the area. I loved being one of the only foreigners and with Google translate you don‚Äôt need to speak the language. Quinn and family are lovely and it was just perfect for me. If you‚Äôre looking for authenticity go here. If you‚Äôre looking to complain go elsewhere to keep the vibe because it feels like a sacred place. üòÅ

The farm is beautiful, peaceful, and truly impressive. The Luu family went out of their way to make my stay as pleasant as possible.
Communicating through a translator had its own charm.
It you'd like, you can order homemade meals. There's also the option to do laundry and get help with arranging transportation.
The cabin is located on a hill, so you'll need a bit of strength in your legs, but that's its greatest advantage. No pollution or noise reaches here-just fresh air and the scent of blooming coffee :)
It was the best stay in Vietnam I could have ever imagined!

If you want to get away from the hot busy city life and are in search of an authentic Vietnamese mountain farm stay, this is the place. I stayed here with my 1.5 year old cat and we loved it. Many small comforts are provided to better accommodate you.This place is one of the few places that I found is the same as it is pictured in the host description (in this case it‚Äôs better!). From Vietnamese home cooked meals that are available for breakfast, lunch and dinner, to the authentic livening quarters (equipped with western and Vietnamese bed). I really enjoyed the availability of fresh bananas and avocados on the farm. Everyone went out of their way to accommodate my needs, from cooking vegan meals to clearing the trails so that I could go hiking up in the mountains in the surrounding area. Thanks to the willingness of the family to use a translate app, we shared many laughs and cultural experiences. This is one stay that will forever remain close to my heart. Thank you Quynh & familyüôè

An unforgettable stay with an extremely hospitable family. The room is like a studio with a working desk, attached bathroom and kitchenette. I didn‚Äôt cook and Qu·ª≥nh‚Äôs mother helped with delicious food everyday. Some of the fruit n veg are fresh from their garden and orchard.
The view of the mountains & pine forests is stunning. You can hike up or down the hill. The hike up is very steep but the view at the top is worth all the ‚Äòcrawling‚Äô. If you hike down, beware that the neighbour‚Äôs dogs can be intimidating when you pass.
If you feel adventurous, I recommend asking the host family for a bike to go on your own bike ride through the villages towards Ta Nung pass. It is one of the most scenic rides in Vietnam, rivaled only by the one in North east Vietnam.
I can‚Äôt recommend this home enough to those wanting to experience mountainous Vietnam at its most peaceful and authentic.
Huge thanks to Qu·ª≥nh & family for sharing your home & treating guests with so much warmth and hospitality ‚ù§Ô∏è
Can I give this place a 6 star over 5? Everything was great: a real farm stay experience, fantastic view, close to nature. Organic fruits. Definitely come back!

We had the best time at Zenda. The nature is beautiful, it is such a peaceful location. We went on an early morning hike up the hill to watch the clouds. The town is a quiet, local town. Our tent was right by the waterfall, we had such a good time just watching the waterfall. The roads that took us up the mountain were also beautiful. Zenda served us great local food - we had a bbq as well as a hotpot. Our hosts were lovely and attentive. Definitely recommend this place if you are traveling to Vietnam but want to go off the beaten track.

Good place to stay overall in Da Lat. Excellent location. Accessibility may be an issue for people unable to walk up stairs.
We enjoyed the outdoor space. Pleasant greenery and functional kitchen area.

Great potential if the place is fixed up better.

Very tastefully designed place with lots of pet dogs and chickens. I really enjoyed the stay with my wife and talking to our hosts. It gets cold at night in December so be prepared to be close to the heater. Place was clean and cosy, though there isn't that much around in walking distance. Hence the quiet. Get a vehicle and you'll be good! City centre is a 5 minute ride away.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful! Due to a flight delay, we arrived in Da Lat around 11 PM, but the host was incredibly considerate. She stayed in touch with us throughout the evening and personally greeted us at the gate upon our late arrival.
The property has five extremely adorable dogs, which made our stay even more special. At first, I was afraid of dogs, but their friendliness quickly put me at ease. Among them, the corgi (who happens to be the dad!) stayed near our door at night, which made me feel incredibly safe.
The wooden bungalow was cozy, and the host was very kind and accommodating. It was such a unique and memorable experience! One tip: Da Lat can be chilly, so pack some warm clothes.
Also, don‚Äôt forget to bring mosquito repellent, as there are mosquitoes nearby that might disturb your sleep. But no worries‚Äîthe host thoughtfully provides some spray as well.
I highly recommend this stay for anyone visiting Da Lat! üåü

This was a perfect place for us to retreat after a long day in the city and markets. The bungalow is surrounded by nature, there is literally a tree outside the door and we loved it. It‚Äôs exactly what we needed after many weeks with city life. The place is super central and it‚Äôs hard to imagine a place like this existing with so many plants and trees so close to everything. You just have to go there and see it to believe it.
The hosts are warm and welcoming. I don‚Äôt even know how to describe the hosts but they are the type of people that just warms your heart.
They have some dogs, they all were very cute and just wanted cuddles and attention. They will also leave u alone if u tell them to go so they weren‚Äôt a problem at all. Oh and they also have chickens running around. It might sound like a lot but it was the perfect harmonious place to relax in a natural environment.
We extended our stay many times and ended up staying there for the rest of our days in Da Lat

Maybe the accommodation experience could be 5-star at other times, but unfortunately, for this particular night, I can only give it 2 stars‚Ä¶ The water pipe was broken, and we couldn‚Äôt take a shower on a day when the temperature was over 30 degrees. Although the host tried to fix it, it still affected our experience. The cleanliness and facilities also need improvement. There was dust in many places, the curtains didn‚Äôt block out the light well, and the sound insulation was poor. For the same price, I believe there are many better options in Da Lat.
Things aside, Uyen and Tuyen were very nice, and they responded promptly. The few puppies alone were worth 2 stars‚Äîthey were just so adorable!

We arrived at nightfall and Tuyen was there (many excited dogs in tow) to receive us and show us to our rustic cottage. Warm colours, clean and thoughtful furnishings as well as artistic talent of hosts.
Practically designed cosy interior with perfect space for two guests.
First night we weren‚Äôt so lucky as the next property had noisy guests who yakked past midnight at their yard which our cottage overlooks.
Subsequently we did enjoy peace.
Lovely local restaurants and eateries nearby, very walkable and safe.
Tuyen helped to change our sleeper bus booking in time (wrong date booked!) Thankfully!
He was hard at work on refurbishing another unit, all the best!

Such a great and fun place to stay in! Great location and the hosts are really nice and friendly. They waited for us to check in till it‚Äôs pretty late at night because our flight was delayed. Not to mention the corgi couple and their puppies they got at the house! They were so adorable, sweet and smart and not noisy at all. It was so fun to stay in such a wonderful place. 100% recommend.

Uyen and her husband were so kind and super helpful! Uyen offered lots of great food recommendations and help us buy medicine when one of us got sick. The house is an oasis full of plants, chickens and super adorable puppies! We would stay there again if come back to Dalat.

Lovely bungalow just a few minutes walk to a lovely cafe (now cafe) and some restaurants. The bungalow was spacious and clean with a comfy bed and the area was so much nicer than downtown but still close to everything.  We saw a beautiful sunset from our terrace. there was good communication and the dogs were so lovely even for a non dog person, so don't worry if you are a but weary of dogs they are very calm. We would definitely book again

The place is exactly as expected. The weather was cold at night during our stay in January, temperature at night is about 14 degree C. Luckily the owner provide us with heater. We rented a motorbike and there is no issue travel around.
We would suggest to do gardening maintenance, it will further improve the wonderful surrounding.

DaLat is quite a peaceful place to stay during your Vietnam trip, if you enjoy the trees and lake there, you should choose DreamLake as your home there to stay. They have three puppies to welcome you at the gate, and I also enjoy the pho there, you can‚Äôt miss it, you may walk to the shop around 4 mins.

During my time in Dalat, I had the pleasure of experiencing a truly picturesque stay. The lush greenery of the surroundings provided a serene and tranquil atmosphere. What made the experience even more delightful were the three adorable puppies owned by the host, who added an extra touch of warmth and joy to the place.

Staying at this homestay was a rejuvenating experience! Nestled in nature, the serene surroundings were a perfect escape from the city. The hosts were incredibly welcoming, and their lovely dogs made the stay even more enjoyable. If you're looking for a peaceful retreat close to nature, this is the place to be!

Dancing Hearts is a great discovery in Dalat where most places are overly commercial. The cottage and the surrounding are indeed a retreat for me. A wonderful jungle bath. Everything invites and allows me to be me. Now I understand the name Dancing Hearts. It's in the middle of a pine forest but I felt comfortable immediately, also thank to the support of Linh as one of the most caring host I've met.

This is a very special place. It is in the middle of pure nature, far from everything. It is an ideal place if you want to rest and be remote from the crazy life. It is equipped with almost everything you need. It has even a small stream in front. To get here a bit tricky but Linh helps you so you don't need to worry about it. Well, actually the tricky of getting here makes it special :) Only negative thing I have to mention is the men that started working for the construction of the next house from very early in the morning which we were not expecting at all, so it surprised. They were carrying earth from the riverside to the house on their motorcycles passing through the garden of Linh's house. I let know Linh about it and asked her to inform her future guests for the work schedule of them. But this did not vanish the pleasure that we were having by being there at all.

This house is literally in the middle of the forest, a real fairy tale! No one around, only one house with very cute family, and otherwise just you and nature. Huge bright stream, the sound of which made it so good to sleep. There is everything you need to cook (Linh even loaded the refrigerator with simple food: eggs, bread, spices oil, peanut butter), we had a barbecue outside in the evening and it was so fun and delicious! Keep in mind that you will have to get to the house through the forest where is no normal road, after 5 pm it will be dark and there will be no lighting, this can be scary, but my friends and I had fun and took it as an adventure, we really liked it, just be prepared that if you are a beginner, driving a bike will be difficult, but Linh immediately offered to help with this, so do not worry, they will help you get there. There are also 2 cute puppies, I love animals and played with them all the time, after I got bites probably from fleas, so wash your hands üòÇ

I recently had the chance to stay at this beautiful wooden homestay, and it was truly an experience to remember. From the moment I arrived, I felt an incredible sense of peace‚Äîthe sound of the nearby stream, the fresh air, and the lush greenery all around made it feel like a hidden sanctuary.
The house itself is simple, but that‚Äôs what makes it special. It‚Äôs clean, cozy, and thoughtfully designed to blend with the nature. I spent my mornings sipping tea on the porch, watching the sunlight filter through the trees, and my evenings enjoying the quiet, away from the city‚Äôs noise.
What I loved most was the perfect balance‚Äîit‚Äôs secluded enough to feel like an escape, yet close enough to the city.
Highly recommend for anyone needing a reset and a breath of fresh air. I'll definitely be back!
Super nice place in the middle of nature! Hard to find but very much worth the effort!!

Few things to remember - you will be on your own as the place in secluded. Do carry groceries if you like cooking else Linh‚Äôs local Manager can provide meals. I had initially booked the place for 4 days but loved it so much that would certainly come back for my rest of the time in Dalat.

Amazing place, everything is brand new. Nordic style decor, comfortable bed, state of art / high tech hot shower, amenities, nice neighborhood at walking distance to relevant places. Many Cafes around. Elevator in the building, hotel-like experience with personalized care and attention. Courtesy water bottles available. Safety-oriented building wiith fire plan and fire extinguishers in the hallways, tag-activated elevator that only goes from your floor to the entrance. The owner went above and beyond to assist me on every possible need, helped me booking tickets, let me drop my luggage early in the morning, took my heavy luggage up to the room and even walked me to the van pick up spot. Always very respectful and friendly, good communication skills. I totally recommend this place. And the city is quite cold year-round, so the modern fan  in the room does the trick very well (other parts in Vietnam are very hot and AC is needed, but definitely not the case in Da Lat).

Absolutely loved my stay here! The room was spacious, spotless, and had a cozy vibe. The bed was super comfortable, and the bathroom was clean with good water pressure. The staff went out of their way to make us feel at home. Would definitely stay again and recommend it to others!

I booked this place because the lake view looked amazing in the photos. At first, I was a bit hesitant since some old reviews mentioned issues like no electricity, no water. So I checked with the host beforehand ‚Äî they explained it was due to a storm a while back, but everything has been fixed since then. That made me feel much more confident to book.
And honestly, the place is beautiful. A wooden house right by the lake, tucked away in a peaceful natural area. The house has everything you need to cook for yourself, or you can ask the caretaker to prepare meals for a small fee. If you‚Äôre a nature lover and want to escape the city noise, this spot is perfect for you.

The Airbnb is located right in front of an incredible lake, the place is lost in the middle of Vietnamese nature. Perfect for relaxing and enjoying nature next to a magnificent lake. The place is private and very quiet, we felt at home there. The host is incredible, attentive and kind. He came to see us during the stay, we talked and spent time together. I recommend with your eyes closed. magical moment.

I honestly have no idea how this place has a 4.x rating. I genuinely question whether the other reviews stayed at the same place. When we arrived, there was no electricity or running water, making the place totally unlivable. The host was unhelpful and barely responsive, offering no real support. The space itself was not so clean, flies everywhere, the concrete was dirty, stains on the window, and dusty everywhere. It looked more like a run-down shed than anything remotely acceptable. The host still refused to cancel our booking or give any compensation even when we called to complain multiple times. In the end we had to leave immediately and called airbnb support for help to get a refund and find a new place to stay. Extremely disappointing.

The spectacular view of this place is worth everything else. We loved watching the fog lingering over the quite lake in the morning, and the sun setting on the water. There was absolute silence, saved for insect noise and birdsong. There was minor things to be improved with hot water (solar powered so it wasn't hot enough) and the mattress could be a bit comfier. But really, we'll come back again just for this view. Wow!

We had extremely tranquil time to be here at this property, we love nature and the view from Tho Non is unbeatable. It is just breathtaking and relax for people who want to stay away from the crowd like us.
The food is amazing with all the catering they did, you dont need to go anywhere, just stay and enjoy your beautiful time with loved ones.
Everything is perfect and we will definitely be back multiple time. Highly recommend for who is seeking a peaceful, quiet and beautiful vacation
Spectacular view. Such a lovely place for vacation away

Was a good stay, the host is very helpful and answering quickly.
The place is cozy, nice view and good sleep.
We enjoyed reading a book in the terrace and the vegetable bbq was just perfect.
The kitchen is spacious and well equipped.
Two things we didnt like:
- flies! so many of them!
in the morning is not possible to lie in bed with open window or sit outside , because the flies sit on your body all the time, nothing helps. something should be done with that.
- when there is no sunshine, there is no hot water in shower. We arrived in the evening, was cold and we couldnt warm up.
The rest is fine, we would come back again if the problem with flies is solved.

Lily is a kind and responsive host who kindly allowed me to check in early at no extra charge. The price is among the most affordable in Da Lat, yet the quality is still well maintained. The room is clean and spacious, a great choice if you don‚Äôt mind a shared bathroom. Highly recommended!

After almost 1 month of travelling solo in Vietnam I decided to stay with locals for a change. The moment I checked in, I was so glad of my decision. if the road was not under construction, this is going to be a perfect place, it's just so inconvenient for us to walk a lot just to get to the store.

Leider war der Boden sehr dreckig. Au√üerdem war die K√ºche nicht gut ausgestattet. Wenig K√ºchenutensilien (z.B. nur ein Teller f√ºr 2 Personen). Au√üerdem ist das Zimmer sehr dunkel durch die schwarze Wandfarbe.

We stayed in this apartment for a few days and were pleasantly surprised. This place is the best choice for a very reasonable price. The location of this apartment will let you get to many interesting places quickly as it is nearly in the center of the town. There is a small cafe right under your apartment, where a friendly hostess will feed you delicious homemade Pho Bo. There is a laundry next door where you can get your things washed. There are lots of small shops and stalls around where you can buy ready-made food or fresh staff to cook in your own well-equipped kitchen.
Pho is a very caring, helpful and easy-going host, always ready to make your stay pleasant.
We're sure to recommend this apartment!

Overall, a decent place to stay for a few days, but there were several disappointments:
-The location near a small, smelly canal made it impossible to open the windows or doors, leaving the room feeling stuffy and moldy.
-Poor soundproofing meant constant noise from the food vendor‚Äôs family downstairs, which was very disruptive.
-While the dark-toned furniture looked stylish, the lack of proper cleaning left it dusty and unkempt.

Duong and Anna were very helpful throughout our stay. A lot of places to visit nearby and was easy to locate. Take note, the place is located within a busy street so it could be quite noisy for some although it didnt matter much for us. Loved our stay here.

I had an overnight stay here at the place and place is very comfy and cozy as described. They have a balcony also facing the main roa. Place is nearby to many attractions and also walkable to cafes and restaurants in Dalat. There is a small restaurant downstairs also where you can have a quick meal.

This place truly feels like an oasis in the heart of Da Lat. From the moment I stepped in, it reminded me of the cozy wooden houses from my hometown. Yet, it‚Äôs fully equipped with all the modern amenities needed for my comfortable stay. I especially loved the peaceful stream, the serene lake, and the lush greenery surrounding the house. The hosts were incredibly kind and welcoming. I‚Äôll definitely return here for my next holiday!

The cabin is a little
Oasis in thr middle of Dalat. It is Dow a sloping hill and could be slippery when wet but to was worth the experience, living in the woods, accompanied by the dog and cat and many koi‚Äôs. I cannot express how it felt like a pocket dimension, where time stopped, and you are allowed to swing below a porch on a hammock and listen to the birds and the rushing stream, where frogs sing day and night, where you can pick fresh tea leaves to brew a cuppa tea in the afternoon, and enjoy the rain hitting the tin roof‚Ä¶

We arrived in Dalat early in the morning and Tuyet was very responsive and flexible about us checking in early. Similarly on our last day as we had a late bus to catch with letting us stay on a bit so that we wouldn't have too much time to kill hauling our luggage around.
The space was homely and cosy with lush green outdoor areas we could enjoy the summer weather. The kitchen came well equipped which allows for guests to stay in if they so wish.
The bean bags were the cherry on top of the icing and having Nala and Lem as furry companions made this a true home away from home.

This place is truly delightful, offering a breathtaking view and a prime location near the heart of the city. The friendly dogs and cats were always there to guide and protect me whenever I stepped outside from the door to the gate. The unique decor perfectly blends with modern amenities, creating a comfortable and inviting atmosphere. Although the steep road to the house can be quite tiring, the stunning view makes every effort worthwhile.
absolutely beautiful, if we stayed any longer I think we would have left our jobs and started working at the farm. thank you üôè

I still think about my stay. Beautiful gardens thoughtful design choices on the rustic cabin. Fresh air, privacy, safety. I hardly ever closed the door or windows, never worried about locks. 4 dogs and 2 cats pretty much spent the entire time with me, one of the cats sleeps in the bed. Neighbors are family members of the owners, and roast coffee. There‚Äôs a cafe bordering the property which I visited every day, with its own two dogs and two cats, and probably the best vibe of anywhere I spent in Da Lat. Hosts spoke great English and were so nice. It was a perfect stay.

I loved this place. It was not what we expected, in a great way. It was stunning.  I would highly recommend it. The animals were the best.  The greenery and little stream was wonderful. Dont pass up an amazing opportunity.

This place was incredible! It had everything I needed, and I appreciated how much thought went into the structure and design of the house. The atmosphere was absolutely beautiful- from the garden to the koi pond to the sweetest animals. I hope to be back!
Wow we felt at home the second we arrived. We booked an Airbnb and made a family for a week with all the animals in this beautiful retreat just outside the city. Can‚Äôt recommend enough

Lovely, rustic, lived-in cabin. It is located down a very steep hill, so you feel secluded in nature away from the city. There is an adorable coffee shop called Linh Lam right next door. Must love animals - we enjoyed the company of the 4 dogs and 2 cats!

Beautiful place, lovely and quiet and a little off the main road. Host was very helpful and the space was perfect for anyone wanting to relax or do a bit of work/study.
Note: the place is down quite a steep driveway which is slippery when wet.

I had a wonderful week stay at the wooden cabin. The surroundings were beautiful and the lovely peaceful sound of the stream outside. The room and accommodation was spacious and provided all materials need for the stay including cooking equipment, towels, drinking water etc. The wooden charm of the cabin was extra special and the hosts were always available to help. The highlight of my trip was the mom dog Nala and her two puppies, also the 2 cats that visited. Just make sure to bring allergy tablets if you need as they cats sleep on the bed with you. I can highly recommend this stay if you are wanting some peace and quiet in the beautiful surroundings.
Fantastisk sted, super dejlige omgivelser med venlige dyr. Virkelig det rareste steder vi nogensinde har v√¶ret.
cetait assez rustique simple et assez difficile d'acc√®s. cest un prix √©lev√© pour la r√©gion mais c'est une experience unique. le jardin est exceptionnel et le voisinage est sympathique.

We had the most amazing stay. Everything listed was as expected plus more. The beautiful scenery, comfortable ammenities and lovely nature of both the hosts and the environment made it a super enjoyable stay. We loved spending time in the garden and playing with the animals. We will miss the puppies, the cats & Nala who always stayed by our side. Waking up with the sun on our face as we drank local coffee every morning was the perfect way to start our day. Laying on the beanbags by the fire at night was the perfect way to unwind. We highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful and comfortable stay while in Dalat. We became quite attached to the place and will definitely visit again.

I cannot recommend this place enough. It can be a little challenging getting down on a bike but is walkable. despite that, its absolutely worth the journey. its peaceful, its private, its perfect. We came to celebrate a birthday and they decorated the place as a surprise and it was so lovely and kind of them. The dog is incredibly friendly! Their brother is also very kind and everyone is so approachable. Ah, loved it so much we ended up staying longer.
Thank you for this space!!
The place is in a beautiful setting, peaceful and quiet. It has termites that caused us to leave early. There are gaps/holes in the walls that need to be fixed.
Very beautiful place on a hillside, would recommend

Stay at the cabin was a therapeutic experience that hits all the right spots for a urban dweller. The quaint, lived-in wooden house offers a taste of rustic living, with adorable companionship of 2 cats and 2 dogs. Furnishing and amenities are simple and yet thoughtfully designed. Located at the bottom of a populated valley of sort, the view isn't noteworthy, but the lush greenery gives good privacy and pleasant tranquility. Location is decent -- 10~20mins stroll to the biggest grocery/shopping complex and several attractions, though need to go through narrow alleyways, and the very steep slope was a mini-exercise to climb or descend. Hosts are friendly, helpful and provided great local recommendations.
Overall it's a lovely place that offers a unique experience. Made my Dalat trip so much more memorable than a hotel stay would. Very thankful.

We had the most wonderful experience staying at this cabin beside a peaceful stream in a serene garden at the bottom of a valley. The wooden cabin is cozy and spacious, offering all the comforts you need for a relaxing getaway. The hot water, TV, and amenities were excellent, and the fully equipped kitchen made it easy to prepare meals. While the bed could be a bit bigger for two people, it was still comfortable, and the bean bags were a delightful touch.
The environment is tranquil, and the insects were surprisingly not bothersome. The sound of the rain on the cabin‚Äôs roof added a soothing ambiance, making it a perfect place to sleep and rejuvenate. As dog lovers, we absolutely adored the friendly dogs on the property, which made our stay even more enjoyable.
Overall, this cabin is a hidden gem, especially for those seeking a healing retreat.

The house is newly built but designed with a charming old-world cottage vibe. It truly feels like stepping into an English countryside village. One of the best homestay we been to.
In the first day, we arrived 30mins early and the host is already at the door waiting for us. The room is exactly as described on the site, extremely clean and smell really good. We didn‚Äôt realize we need a window only when there is none, the room can be very bright during the day but we didn‚Äôt really like to leave the door open for fresh air.
During the stay, I unfortunately had an accident with the slipery hair conditioner we brought, extra note here that please wear the pair of slippers the host prepped for you, because the the floor can get a bit slippery during and after you had your shower.

It‚Äôs a cozy homestay locates somewhere at very centre of Dalat city. Tho, it was very cold during the night so I wished the blankets would be thicker. The curtains also need to be replaced with fabric type rather than the sliding wooden as it‚Äôs hard to close up and down whenever you want to walk out or somewhat enhance your privacy.

T and Doh are wonderful hosts-the farm is beautiful. 5 years ago was just a field! Incredible fruit all over the place, and coffee everywhere. Shared dinners with family-far enough out of town to escape, but close enough to blast in for supplies. Received a beautiful belt handmade on property-great gift! About an hour from Da Lat city, but I was happy I stayed here away from the bustle of Da Lat. Thanks again to the entire family. T took me hiking up the mountain behind farm- beautiful views! What an incredible experience! My boyfriend and I were looking for an oasis to connect with nature and focus on work while staying in a peaceful, quiet place- and this is exactly what we found. The garden, fruit trees, fire pit, and waterfall make the outdoors so enjoyable to be in. WiFi was perfect. We really felt at home and we wish their family the best of wishes. 10/10 stay. So grateful!!

Decampo is a peaceful and serene place to stay. Hung was so kind to recommend some great restaurants in the area and kindly helped us arrange a transfer to the airport for an early morning flight. this place is a gem. tucked in a little alley is a gorgeous wooden house. The home is beautiful furnished and the wooden walls and ceiling provide a homey atmosphere. The master bedroom has a loft to hang out with great views of the city. if you are going to dalat, you have to stay here!

The place looks even better than the pictures! Included many great views and great location to reach many spots. Hung is also a very responsive and helpful host! Definitely recommend this spot for those visiting Da Lat

This home was absolutely beautiful. It was impeccably clean and had everything you could need. The bedding was high quality and very  comfortable. Hung went above and beyond to host us.

I had an amazing time staying here at this Airbnb in Da Lat! The home is beautiful and equipped with almost everything you need for a comfortable stay. H√πng was incredibly welcoming and went out of their way to ensure our visit was perfect. If I were in town again, I would definitely choose to stay at this home again.

One of the best airbnbs we‚Äôve ever stayed in. Host was so lovely, helping us with early check in due to our early flight and local recommendations. The house itself is phenomenal, so much character and stunning. We had an awesome experience in Ducampo House! Rustic decoration and a beautiful garden! The host is very patient and refined, definitely impressive! Thank you!
Wonderful stay at such a beautiful property! All amenities and essentials were well thought of and provided. H√πng was very helpful and responsive

Me and my wife had an amazing time in Dalat and would stay here again if we were to revisit.

A perfect retreat surrounded by beautiful nature and a place I always looked forward to returning to at the end of a long day. lovely place to stay, easy to find. a few great coffee shops nearby. within reasonable distance from the city centre. motorbikes available for rent, laundry service available. the private bathroom was small but worked well. there are no ventilation systems so it can get a little humid inside. the team was so friendly and hospitable, along with the cats and dogs, i felt right at home. thank you trinh and team ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è
