Had a wonderful stay with 4 very welcoming sisters.  Loved the pot of tea on the fire and free eggs and bread for breakfast.  Lovely gardens, a cute A-frame bungalow, comfy bed and warm doona.  Would definitely stay again.

The hosts are incredibly lovely and helpful! It‚Äôs a nice, communal vibe and great value too.
A few negatives to be aware of (ie the room is very small, not so clean shared kitchen area, lots of mosquitos), but overall the place has a charm, and is located in a cool area just outside the main city.

Best place ever!!  The sisters that run it are all smart, artistic, and beautiful.  They make you feel very much at home.  Plus, they offer delicious make-your-own breakfasts.  Plus, they put on interesting cultural/artistic events, like movie nights and pottery classes if your interested.  Plus, they even patiently tutor you in Vietnamese if you're learning.  This place attracts the very most interesting guests.  Only problem is it's starting to get a bit famous.  Book it fast!  You won't be sorry!!

This is a hidden place in Dalat where you can find an easy and calm spot. The garden is very cozy, the rooms are basic but everything you need. Wake up and make your free toast with eggs and a slice of cake. The owners are super friendly. We rent a scooter there and with a short drive of 5-10 minutes you are in the city center. Do not expect young backpacker vibe but more local tourists and more adult laid back travel vibe. We spent 3 nights here and would recommended it if your looking for a little sweet hangout in Dalat. Enjoy! Tam Biet

One of the best Airbnbs I‚Äôve been to! Worth the price and definitely like the reviews say. They host events everyday like mini parties or uno games if you are here short term or pottery opportunities if you are here longer. You can meet other travellers and there are a few dogs and cats to keep you company with some fresh vegetables and bread for breakfast. My friend and I really enjoyed it here and Dalat is so lovely~
It feels like being at home. This place is so peaceful and the bed was super comfy. I love that there‚Äôs a private toilet even though it‚Äôs small. It was amazing! I also love the surrounding area.

What a wonderful homestay! All the stuff there are so nice and really helped us a lot‚ò∫Ô∏è The view is amazing, which is quite suitable for Dalat chill vibe, tho I just stay for one day, I can tell living here is defo never boring and full of fun!
Always the very best!  The vibe is artistic and inclusive.  A wonderful stay every time.  Highest recommendation!!!

N·∫Øp Homestay , Teepee is truly a perfect getaway for couples looking to relax and experience Da Lat. The bungalows are located at the foot of a hill, surrounded by greenery, and the property is eco-friendly, saying no to plastic.
The motorbike rental prices are reasonable. There‚Äôs a self-service area selling soju, soft drinks, and filtered water. For drinking water, there‚Äôs a water purifier available, promoting environmental protection. There‚Äôs also a caf√© counter offering drinks and pastries at fair prices. Laundry service is available but a bit pricey at 30,000 VND per kilogram.
Hot water is provided, but the temperature fluctuates‚Äîsometimes too hot, other times too cold‚Äîthough still usable. Since the homestay is in a garden setting, there are quite a few mosquitoes and insects. There‚Äôs a shared common area that closes and turns off the lights at 11 PM. Overall, the place is clean, small, and charming.
Wonderful place.  Wonderful people.  Feels like a happy, artistic, welcoming family.    Highest recommendation.
I stay here every time I am in Dalat.  It feels like coming home to my family.  It is the best place ever!!

It was an amazing experience to stay in this lovely place, was so healing. Plants everywhere and they have the cutest kittens in the world. Room is cozy and comfortable loved the massive window. Be careful in bathroom was so slippery. Location is convenient not in the city center but can assess easily by scooter . It‚Äôs very handy to rent a scooter from this place save some time. Girls are always kind willing to help both are very artistic too. Loved this place so much will definitely recommend to everyone.

The absolute best stay we experienced in Vietnam. Da Lat is truly a remarkable place and this accommodation was the perfect choice. Just a short 5-minute walk from the town center, yet incredibly serene and tranquil. The staff treats you like family and will go above and beyond to make you feel special. A truly rejuvenating stay with exceptionally friendly staff. They even offer scooter rentals, which is a huge plus. Complimentary breakfast and a small grocery collection / mini store on-site. You'll find everything you need here. Don't hesitate for a moment, this is the best stay you can have in Dalat.
Many thanks to the wonderful ladies... Apologies for forgetting their names. All three of them were simply exceptional. Truly an incredible experience!
Wonderful hosts.  Great communication.  Magnificent, friendly, welcoming environment.  Very much enjoyed my stay

A peaceful, cozy homestay that truly feels like home. Beautiful European-style architecture, a spacious garden, and the sweetest host make it easy to relax. You‚Äôre free to explore the garden, pick fresh herbs, and enjoy free coffee, tea, noodles‚Äîeven a glass of wine. Watching the train pass by through the window was such a lovely touch. A bit far from the city center, but perfect for a quiet, soul-soothing stay.

This home is the best I have ever stayed in Dalat. All clean and tidy including inside and outside. Special thanks to Mr. Tri, he‚Äôs very helpful and friendly. Every time I needed support he was always there right the way. This place made me feel like home and over my expectation
I will be back and choose this place absolutely. Thank you for having me, Riurit Home
very peacefull
tuy·ªát v·ªùi

The home and the view are beautiful, and the host is very kind and welcoming. There are a few things I wish I had known before booking: there is a construction project going on right next door, so there was noise throughout my entire stay. Also, the power went out several times when it rained so I was not able to cook on the electric stove. Despite these difficulties, I had a great time here. I would stay again and recommend it to others!

Absolutely phenomenal!  Gorgeous space outside of Dalat (plan on extra travel time but it's so worth it for the views and the experience) with a generous, helpful, and kind host who will be full of wonderful ideas for how to make your stay exciting and fun. We loved every second and couldn't get over waking up to that view.

Wow, just wow!  Stunning natural beauty, quiet, peaceful, authentic rural retreat location.  The place is so well set up for guests - so thoughtfully designed with multiple water and power outlets, plus very good wifi (40MB up & down).  The outdoor deck is a perfect spot to be, reflect, read, write and take in the verdant views of farms, fields, terraces and the southern highlands.   I knew I'd be getting city time in HCMC and wanted to complement that with a slice of Vietnam's agricultural and pastoral side, and my stay there absolutely achieved that.  Highly recommend for anyone used to glamping and who is fine with simple, rustic amenities.

WOW!  What a nice surprise it was to stay at Ivy Farm.  I usually stay at more central places, because meeting people is an importan t part of travel for me.  At Ivy Farm, the view was stupendous.  The sileence was majestic.  But what was surprissing was the quality of new friendships that I made there.   Ivy's place attracts a different kind of traveller.  More aware and open.  And Ivy herself is magnificent.  She has dedicated herself to creating a spaace that will provid everything you need.  For a unique travel experience that's relaxing and stimulating at the same time, do yourself a favor.  Stay at Ivy Farm

We had a beautiful time at Ivy farm! We hired motorbikes from the airport to get there which I would highly recommend if you are wanting to sight see . The farm is out of the way but that‚Äôs exactly the peaceful relaxing vibe we intentionally booked. Leaving the property was hard as the scenery is so blissful. The host were great with communication and delivered us fresh fruit from the farm. We Will also remember our beautiful time here. Thank you!
An amazing place with a friendly and hospitable host - thank you very much Thao for making our stay so special. A great place to relax and enjoy the nature. Highly recommended!

A beautiful retreat from the hussle and bussles of the city life. Ivy's place is secluded and alone in the hillsides. Beautiful views and you really feel like you are getting the true culture of Vietnam. Ivy and her husband and very kind souls that were always willing to help if we had any issues with anything. She even went shopping for us when we realized we didn't bring enough food and we're farther out then we thought to walk to the nearest market or get grab. Would highly recommend!

Wonderful experience at Ivy's place. Be ready to be in nature! Plenty of comforts such as fast wifi (good enough for video calls), drinking water, and of course Ivy's kindness. Everything others have said is true, this is a special place.

Das war eins der tollsten Airbnb die ich besucht habe. Die Gastgeberin hat mich sofort in Empfang genommen und am Abend hat Sie mich sogar zum Essen eingeladen.
Sie war so nett und freundlich, und hat sich die ganze Zeit um mich gek√ºmmert.
Sogar meine W√§sche hat sie f√ºr mich gewaschen was nicht selbstverst√§ndlich ist.
Ich kann dieses Airbnb nur jedem empfehlen und w√ºrde es auch wieder besuchen wenn ich in der Region bin.

A beautiful place for peace, harmony and clean air..
As you can see from all the positive reviews that Ivy has already received (and rightly so) there is no doubt that this is an incredibly beautiful place. If you are looking for peace and quiet away from the hustle and bustle of the city, this is perfect.
What I would like to highlight, however, is the hostess, Ivy. She is an incredibly warm, friendly, helpful person (she even washed my clothes and didn't even charge me for it!). You will never find a better host, I would say, and I have traveled a lot around the world.
If this is what you are looking for, and you are comfortable being far away from luxury and traffic and poor air quality, and are comfortable with a basic lifestyle with incredibly friendly people around you who only want you well, I cannot recommend Ivy's Farm enough.
Try it and judge for yourself. Highly recommended, honestly, fellow travelers. Don't miss this. Thank you so much for a rewarding and memorable stay.

Our stay was amazing! ‚ú®
Ivy is really friendly and helped us with renting a motorbike (which you need in order to go to town) and we even went to eat Hu Tieu together.
The accommodation is stunning and has everything you need. The only negative thing i would say is that the mattress is really hard but we fixed it with asking for more blankets.
I really recommend to stay here!

We had such a wonderful time at this air BNB. Located quite rural, so it was ideal to calm down from the chaos of all the cities.
The host was very warm, accommodating and showed us the neighbourhood on his bike! We were always met with a big smile.
Highly recommend if you want an escape from the hustle of the big cities!
Peaceful. Host made me feel like family. Loved hiking around. She also let me rent out her motorbike so I could see the Pagoda and waterfalls.

We had a truly unforgettable stay at Ivy Farm thanks to Ivy. We did not feel comfortable renting motorbikes, so with the location of the Airbnb being fairly remote, Ivy and her neighbour drove us around on their motorbikes to see the local sights and pick up groceries. We got to visit a silk farm, a Pagoda, a mushroom farm, and the city of Da Lat. Ivy is an incredibly kind host who will take you where you want to go out of the goodness of her heart, and even brought her karaoke machine and watercolour painting supplies up to the accommodation for our final night!!
The view from the accommodation is breathtaking, and so peaceful. We happily spent our evenings with a beer in hand, sat by the firepit grilling food on the BBQ.
If you're looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and switch off surrounded by nature, look no further!

Probablement ma meilleure exp√©rience en vacances ! Nous avons √©t√© accueillis chaleureusement et Phuong Thao a pass√© la journ√©e avec nous, elle a √©t√© une super guide. Nous avons fait un super repas ensemble sur cette magnifique terrasse. La vue est splendide ! On a ador√© ! Si nous revenons dans la r√©gion de Da Lat un jour, nous logerons chez elle √† nouveau.
C‚Äôest √† 1h de route du centre-ville mais Phung Thao va tout organiser pour le trajet.

We had a lovely stay at Ivy Farm. The perfect place for rest and relaxation. Couldn‚Äôt recommend it more. We can‚Äôt wait to go back. If you enjoy quiet and peaceful surroundings with beautiful nature it‚Äôs the perfect place for you :)

‚ÄúA perfect place surrounded by beautiful nature, with kind and helpful hosts. We had a great time! Anyone interested in nature and a place that has everything you need for your stay is welcome here, and the internet is excellent as well ‚ù§Ô∏è
One of the best stay in Dalat. View was amazing. The host hospitality was amazing.

Ivy's Farm is nothing short of paradise on earth. She and her husband are among the most compassionate people around. I went to enjoy nature and explore small local towns. I had issues with my motorbike and language barriers. Ivy was aware of this and messaged me early on my first morning to check if I was okay. She came over, grabbed a pair of scissors, and cut some tea leaves, guava, and stevia, all within twenty feet of where I slept. She tossed those seemingly random leaves into a kettle, and the magic of Vietnam and Ivy's Farm began to unfold. We enjoyed this delicious pot of tea, using Google Translate for over two hours on my first morning as a broken man on a retreat. I started to appreciate the beauty of the hills, the serenity of the land, and the warmth of my hostess. She offered her time to assist me with my motorbike and took me to a nearby village, where we ate incredible food, met local artists, and saw stunning scenery. Most beautiful of all was Ivy's compassion. Best!!

Wir hatten eine sch√∂ne Zeit in der Unterkunft. Die Gastgeber waren zuvorkommend, lieb und aufgeschlossen. Wir haben uns gleich wie zu Hause gef√ºhlt. Sie haben uns die Gegend gezeigt und uns am Morgen der Abreise sogar zur lokalen Bushaltestelle im Dorf gefahren. Nicht selbstverst√§ndlich, daf√ºr bedanken wir uns sehr!
Der Blick von der Terrasse ist atemberaubend und die Ruhe in der Natur erholsam f√ºr die Seele.
Wir kommen gerne wieder, um noch mehr von der Gegend zu erkunden.

Del mio viaggio di un mese in Vietnam questo sar√† sicuramente il posto che porter√≤ nel cuore per sempre! La casetta √® incantevole, con un patio che d√† sulle montagne con le piantagioni di caff√®. L‚Äôhost √® impeccabile, sempre presente e disponibile per rendere il soggiorno piacevole e si prende cura di te in ogni modo possibile!
Ha sempre il sorriso e si vede che fa questo lavoro con amore.
Il vero Vietnam, con la sua magia e l‚Äôaccoglienza della sua gente , e‚Äô tutto qui.

I had an incredible stay here! The hosts are warm and lovely people who went out of their way to make sure I had a memorable experience. They even picked me up and brought me back to Da Lat, which was such a kind gesture.
They showed me beautiful places and drove me everywhere. We even ate food from their farm, all organic.
I really felt like I was treated as part of the family during my stay, which made the whole experience even more heartwarming.
The house itself is very nice and clean. You have your own private space, but it‚Äôs also easy to reach out to the host if you need help. I highly recommend staying here if you want a unique and unforgettable experience!

Linh is very hospitable, and takes care of our needs throughout the stay. We had the best grilled duck.
The vibe of the villa feels just right, everything falls into place.
m∆°, the villa dog is such a bonus.
I had a peaceful time here.
Thanks for the accommodation.
Will be back.

Moonrise Garden is so far the BEST part of my trip in Vietnam. We had two amazing days and nights at a cozy room with a soothing view to mountains and pine woods.

The garden was handled amazingly. Very impressive transformation within the spans of 6 months. Shout out to Uom‚Äôs butler/gardener for that.
The homestay still maintains its stellar surroundings very well. I had 2 nights in a beautiful house within a beautiful garden. Didn‚Äôt even bother going out since there are so many vegetables growing inside, and miss Thao (the butler) helped me buy rice as well as protein.
Most of my time there, I spent recharging, breathing the fresh air and brewing tea or coffee depending on my mood, and every second worth it.
So yes, just like a few months ago, I still recommend you to book Uom. Because you‚Äôre worthy of a nice retreat too!!!
place is awesome , had a cute cat and dog but the place is a little inaccessible especially for those with elderly and young kids , luckily I came with friends and had a really good time there :)

Such a beautiful hidden gem amidst a dynamic Da Lat center. A private garden with lots of fruits, unique leafs and flowers  and a wooden house following zen style is suitable for family to have relaxing gateaway. We had a cozy bonding and fire camp at night which was truly memorable. Host is always proactive to help us when needed and reccommend beautiful local places to visit. Definitely will come back again when come to Da Lat.

The place is nice and clean, we got everything we need in the house. Their team is helpful and their pets are supper friendly to children. Definitely be back. We recommend the place to who want to find a peaceful and unique experience in Da Lat.

The place is beautifully designed, environment is tranquil and the host is extremely helpful. It is exactly what the name suggested, a garden retreat. we stayed almost a week and it was the best experience we had in Dalat. The host has an extremely well-behaved dog and a cat living on the compound, adding so much to our overall experience. We are already planning a return to Uom Retreat Garden in the near future.

The place is cozy although we were just a four-people family but it was a great experience as everything was really good. The host - Ms Oanh is super friendly and very helpful. The dog always sticked to us and even slept with me the last night. Thank you for everything
Beautiful house, very peaceful and giving the Da Lat vibe. We‚Äôre really enjoying our 5days stay. Highly recommend this house the get a unique experience at the Da Lat city center.

I loved our stay at this Da Lat villa! It was the blend of comfort and charm, with a beautiful garden. The location was not so easy to find as normal hotel, and we had everything we needed for a relaxing getaway.
Thanks, My family had a great vacation.

Spent 1 day & 1 night here. Worth every penny due to its excellent location and beautiful surroundings. I didn't expect this private experience can be found right in the city.
A quick ride to Dalat Market only takes 10 mins, and there were some excellent restaurants nearby as well.
I spent this morning walking to a teahouse nearby and it was amazing too.
The cliff could be a bit difficult to climb if you're not a strong driver, but a part from that, i wholeheartedly love my experience here. Too bad that I only spent 1 night as trial here cause I totally would love to stay more.
10/10, will come back very soon to visit Gau and Bo!

We had amazing experience at Uom Reatreat. It's a very Da Lat vibe house, the original Da Lat that we haven't seen for a long time, so different from the hustle Da Lat center, and you just only need to drive 10min to Da Lat market. We love the glass walls, the curtains. We could even use fresh veggie in the garden, they have some interesting fruits. Their pets are friendly and lovely, they make us feel like home. They have everything you need for a retreat stay. It takes only few minutes to find a market to buy some foods, so you could enjoy the house from morning till night. Oanh shown us how to go to the pine hill near by, we had a nice walk under the pine trees. Overall, we love our stay and the vibe of the house, we're so glad that we've found this unique experience. Highly recommend this house to who want to find some peace. Definitely will come back to watch the grown up hydrangea, also visit Gau and Bo.
Beautiful peaceful quite place.
Big suggest for this home

100% recommended and I will definitely come back.

We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience! Our bus arrived at 5 AM (way earlier than expected), and it was ü•∂freezing in Dalat‚Äîbut our incredibly kind host graciously allowed us to check in early. That warmth (both literally and figuratively!) set the tone for our entire stay.
The real stars of the house were the three cats and one dog‚Äîthe best "room service" everüêà ! A special shoutout to Emi and Tux for keeping us company (and stealing our hearts). We‚Äôre so sad we missed saying goodbye due to the heavy rain today, but we promise to bring treats for them next time!

We had a great 2 night stay at Vu‚Äôs place! It looked exactly like the pictures and we felt right at home the moment we arrived. The best thing about this is it‚Äôs location! It‚Äôs surrounded by cafes and beautiful streets. Also few minutes walk to night market which is the highlight of our trip. All in all highly recommend Vu‚Äôs place!

The apartment is very close to the city center, with a wide selection of food and drinks. Do be prepared to carry your luggages up to the second level of the building, and the walkway to the stairwell is pretty narrow. The apartment is well-kept with a rustic feel, with the wooden decor and all. It was such a pleasure to be staying here, although we were unlucky to get noisy neighbours who were staying upstairs. Not much of sound-proofing, so we just had to deal with it. The street noise is bearable, which is very common in Vietnam anyway. I do like that Phuc Long coffeehouse is just a few steps away from the apartment, so I can get my morning coffee very conveniently. Overall a pleasant experience staying here. Thanks Vu, for hosting us.

We loved Vus apartment , beautifully decorated & cosy but plenty of room to open 2 large suitcases. Lovely soft bedlinen and good supply of new towels.
Great location with plenty of places to eat close by. Night markets close as well.
Vu was prompt in all communication & very patient with our questions a few times. Vu booked us a driver for a day of sightseeing who was fabulous! Absolutely recommend Vus place for a great few days in Dalat. 10/10! Thanks Vu & Co.
I love the decor and the seamless check in. Beautiful home, perfect location. Will stay again!

I had an amazing experience during my stay at this place in Da Lat! The location is simply unbeatable‚Äîvery central and within walking distance to the Da Lat Market, making it easy to explore everything the area has to offer. There are plenty of food options nearby, so you'll never go hungry!
The host was incredibly kind and accommodating. I was allowed to check in early, which was a thoughtful gesture, and they even offered to store my luggage after checkout, making my departure stress-free.
The space itself is beautifully decorated and feels very cozy, truly making it a ‚Äúhome away from home.‚Äù I loved every moment spent there and would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Lat. I can‚Äôt wait to return !

Vu's place is absolutely exceptional! We only wish we could have stayed longer. It is just as gorgeous as the photos, but even bigger and more spacious IRL. We loved how cosy and homely it feels, while still being in the heart of the action in Dalat. It's walkable to the markets and lake, with loads of cafes and restaurants on your doorstep (and a great vintage shop about 50 metres away too!) Everything was super clean, with everything we could need, and the bed was the comfiest we have had - it felt like a real luxury to stay here. Vu was also super helpful and friendly, even letting us store our bags before check-in and after check-out. 10/10 - highly recommended.
Perfect gelegen in het centrum, vlakbij goeie restaurants. Mooi appartement, wel eerder gehorig.

It was an amazing experience to stay in Vu's apartment!
Totally recommended!
Beautifully designed apartment, super professional and helpful host.
Amazing design home with nice balcony and creative space. Also with coffee machine. Thanks
En flott leilighet med suveren beliggenhet! Vi elsket det, og vertene var veldig behjelpelige!
The best place in Da Lat. Im not joking!

The place was awesome! The road through the mountains took us longer than expected and we had no way to communicate our delay! We arrived almost 2h delayed and at nighttime and Duc and his sister were waiting for us!!!

I absolutely loved my stay at this house ‚Äî it truly feels like home! There‚Äôs everything you could possibly need: from a nice TV to a hair and clothes dryer. Lots of kitchenware and all the essentials for daily life ‚Äî it‚Äôs a real home with a cozy, lived-in vibe. It‚Äôs amazing. Thank you so much for having us!

The location is excellent and the apartment is beautiful, you feel like you are in your own home. The owner is very cooperative and responsive. To be honest, there are some negatives that should be noted, especially for families carrying large suitcases. You have to go down long stairs, which might cause you some harm. I also think there are some things that, in my opinion, are beyond the owner's control. Due to the storm and continuous rain, there are some insects and an electricity problem, but the owner nevertheless made the repairs despite the late hour. There is some disturbance in the morning due to the repairs next to the apartment, which might cause some people to not be able to sleep.

Die Kommunikation war sehr gut. Bei Fragen oder Anliegen war die Familie da.
Ein early check in um 7 Uhr morgens war gl√ºcklicherweise auch m√∂glich.
Garten ist liebevoll gestaltet. Wir hatten ingesamt eine angenehme Zeit in der Unterkunft.

Duc's place is beautiful with a beautiful view! In addition, Duc is extremely responsive and helpful! This is a huge plus.
The only con is there is a strange smell in the master bedroom bathroom, and some construction nearby. This is why I have given only 4 stars regarding the nightly rate. It is so peaceful, yet the construction does not match the environment.
The bathroom smell needs to be built with and more lighting added to the unit itself with upgrades to kitchen area for longer stays.
However, I think the owner will be very responsive to this review, and with that said I can highly recommend this place once these issues have been resolved. Cam on Duc!
The couple had a short time here and felt great, the aunt and uncle were friendly and will definitely come back

I had a great stay at Duc‚Äôs place. It‚Äôs conveniently located near many cafes and restaurants. The interior looks just like the photos and includes all the amenities you‚Äôd need for a comfortable, homey stay. It was great to be able to do laundry. The views from the balcony are especially peaceful in the mornings.
Duc and his siblings were very helpful and communicative throughout my stay. This is a great option for groups or anyone looking for a cozy, home-like experience in Dalat.
A few things to note:
‚Ä¢ It is next to restaurant that is doing some construction
‚Ä¢The building is shared with another Airbnb unit and a side area.
‚Ä¢ There are quite a few stairs to reach the unit, so be prepared for some climbing.
‚Ä¢The main bedroom bed is soft and comfortable, while the upstairs bed is a bit firm.

Our stay at Little Forest wasn‚Äôt as peaceful as we‚Äôd hoped as there was construction right next to the bedroom every day (including weekends!) from 7am. While this may be beyond the host‚Äôs control, it didn‚Äôt spontaneously happen either. I think it would‚Äôve been fair to give guests a heads up that this is ongoing, as the main draw of this place was for the quiet.
Aside from that, cleanliness and overall upkeep could be far improved. The master bathroom had a broken tap which they knew about but hadn‚Äôt fixed until I brought it up, and there was a strong sewage smell wafting from this bathroom during the last 2 days. Can‚Äôt open the windows to air the place especially at night because bugs, and the house gets surprisingly stuffy compared to a concrete house in the city. It‚Äôs also more felt because humidity is higher here compared to the city - a dehumidifier would‚Äôve helped.
Having said that, the host + family were quick to respond & fix issues, but much of these could‚Äôve been avoided.
Lovely place! It matches the pictures exactly. The area is really peaceful and the view is amazing. The house is really well equipped too.

We absolutely loved our stay at this cozy house. Some reviews mentioned the stairway, which, as we counted, has exactly 100 steps! It‚Äôs a nice bit of morning exercise and totally worth it for the secluded feel and the beautiful ravine view from the porch, where we enjoyed our breakfasts.
The mattresses could be a bit softer compared to what you'd typically find in hotels, but aside from that, everything was more than great. The host responded quickly, the internet was fast and stable, the place was peaceful, the shower was hot and had strong pressure, and the house had everything we needed.
Many thanks to Duc!

This place is clean, privacy and very close to nature. Ms Yen and host Duc are very helpful to support us during the stay. There only limit is about the staircase, it takes huge effort to climb up and down from the room to the main gate. This is the only consideration you may take, if you plan to bring elderly to stay here.

One of the best guesthouse experiences we ever had. Peaceful and quiet, but you'll get into Dalat within a few minutes.
Great places for coffee, breakfast and BBQ directly next door.
The guesthouse was spacious, clean and comfy.
Many people who booked rooms in the city asked us how we found such a beautiful place.

Staying at Little Forest was really a good experience ! Duc allowed us for our early check in as we arrived Da Lat at 6.30am. Duc was very helpful with our request and upon our check in , there is a welcome red wine awaiting us ! Duc's place was exactly the same as the pictures shown. Overall , everything was great staying here.

Duc‚Äôs homestay is extremely beautiful, the house located at a chilling place near DaLat‚Äôs central districts. The host communication is friendly and fast, providing my family of 6 a great stay! Highly recommended this place if you want to explore Da Lat at best.

Beautiful view of the outside. Perfect for just winding down after a long day.
Amenities are sufficient with various items inside provided to aid with your stay.
But yes, be prepared to go up and down quite a number of steps to get to the property.

No bad surprises, everything was pretty nice. Nice terrasse with sun exposure in morning, very comfi couch for movie session at night, and the must is the warming bed to keep you warm during the cold nights!

lovely place, location and hosts. all as you expect from the photos..

Would stay again, beautiful view and the host is very accommodating. Lot of amenities like washer and dryer. Restaurant next door had beautiful views, help us pick some avocado. There lot of stairs until you reach the Airbnb so be mindful of that.

Lovely place! Great value. The receptionist looked like he loves his job. Happy for him and happy we chose this place. Delicious food and immaculate hospitality.
Very good and cozy place, was very satisfied

√âmai has consistently been my favorite spot in Dalat, and this visit to their valley location was no exception. Traveling solo, I felt incredibly safe and comfortable. My room was charming and spotless, just as pictured, and the views were breathtaking.
The convenience factor was a major plus. I enjoyed delicious croissants for breakfast, easily ran errands, and then returned for a fantastic dinner at the Italian restaurant downstairs. The goat cheese pumpkin flowers and duck leg confit were absolute highlights.
A special thanks to Kim, the owner. Our conversation was truly inspiring, and his passion for this place is evident. Highly recommend √âmai Valley to anyone seeking a memorable stay in Dalat!

Tastefully designed and gracefully operated, √âmai has always been my go-to getaway place whenever I visit Da Lat. And the food at the bistro is just a chef's kiss, taking the whole experience to another level of satisfaction.

I always choose √âmai as a place to stay when I travel to Dalat. I love the peaceful energy that √âmai delivers to clients. I‚Äôll definitely come back to √âmai whenever I come to Dalat. All the best to √âmai and team. Thanks for your service.

It‚Äôs alway a peace staying at Emai. Cosy, warm and feels like home. Every single corner is well taken care of, with elegant flower decorations. I love the vibes. Staffs are extremely nice. Thank you for hosting us.

What a quaint charming little hotel! We love just about everything here, aesthetic, food, ambiance, etc. It was a nice little getaway from the busy street of Dalat. Come here if you are seeking tranquility. I would definitely come back here if I were to come back to town.
I love √âmai

A new gem in Dalat that I doubt anyone can be disappointed with, especially once the full restaurant is up and running. Can‚Äôt wait for the next time I go to Dalat and enjoy the amazing hospitality from Team √âmai!
We had a great stay, the space is airy with a balcony and the architectural design is great, the breakfast is also delicious and varied.
Super nice and peaceful place. The view from the house in the early morning and sunser was breathtaking. Will come back for longer stay for sure.

Nothing fancy, nothing special, blending in in a quiet corner of Da Sar, this humble cabin invites me to taste the raw life of the K'ho.
The cabin is a simple box with lots of light and a delightful display of the town view. In my second morning here, I woke up to a blanker of clouds right outside the window. In the other day, I woke up to dreamy thoughts and the urge to jot them down.
Everything is within reach of a motorbike ride. I could easily get food and the minimal things I need to try to live like a local. It's a nice change following my days in solitary at Doi Soi, a hill-side cottage by the same host. Civilization came back to me in the most gentle way. So, do bring something to note down your brilliant thoughts because they will come ;)
It'd been a soothing town stay for me. Like a Ghibli sound track during the day and The Beatles by the night. Like a cup of tea in the sun and a glass of single malt Scotch under the stars. Thank you for the warm cuddle, Da Sar!

We had an amazing time here. The hosts were amazing people, really friendly, respectful and responsive. The place is exactly as described. It‚Äôs not a luxurious place, more like a little cabin which, if you like nature and can get to enjoy the experience of a simple life, you will love. One thing is for sure, the hosts are lovely people and deserve to be super host just for the amazing treatment they had with us.

In no short words this has probably been one of the best stays I've had on Airbnb. The location was fantastic, you really are able to feel like you're in a treehouse, in the woods of Da Lat. People say it fits Da Lat's aesthetic, and I hate to admit it, but it does. The place was clean, and comfortable, spacious enough for my partner and I. The sliding doors to the balcony transports you into another world. Peaceful and calm, it made our Da Lat stay that much more memorable, knowing we get to come back and crash there at night.
There was issues with the wifi, I know very pretentious of me, but Luan was able to rectify it the next night. Came in handy for use of the provided projector for movie nights. Issue outside of their control is definitely just the dogs in the area. They can get a bit scrappy at night. I would suggest some ear plugs.
100% would recommend to anyone thinking about booking. Do it before it's too late!

We really enjoyed our stay at Luan‚Äôs place. The little wooden house is filled with sensible touch of art and care from little things like flower vase, interior design impressed by Van Gogh inspirations to mosquitos spray and plenty of heaters for cold nights. He even helped us to rent a motorbike for a day with reasonable price. The house is humbly beautiful, located far inside a beautiful garden, peaceful looking out to the pine trees from the balcony.
Though there are plenty of steps and steep walkways due to natural topography, Luan was very proactive to offer us great help carrying our luggages when checkin and checkout. Communication with Luan is very smoothly, efficient and friendly.
Luan also runs a coffee shop at the front of the property which featured beautiful relaxing garden and nice coffee.
I highly recommend Luan‚Äôs place for a stay in style when in Da Lat.

I stayed at this mobi home with 3 other female friends. One night, someone tried to turn off the lights and open our door around 1‚Äì3 AM, about 3 times. Thankfully, we locked the door so nothing happened.
We were scared and called the caretaker, Ng·ªçc. She was amazing, came right away, stayed overnight, and made us feel safe. Since then, we didn‚Äôt see the suspicious person again.
I wasn‚Äôt sure if it was a real break-in attempt, so I didn‚Äôt want to make a big deal. I just inform the host about it and suggested adding cameras for safety. Sadly, he dismissed it, saying he lived there for a month and had dogs to guard the place. But as guests-strangers too, we didn‚Äôt heard any barking directed at us. Also, what feels safe for him as a man isn‚Äôt the same for us as female guests.
I wasn‚Äôt complaining‚Äîjust giving honest feedback. Safety should always come first.
The place is fine and Ng·ªçc is wonderful, but I hope the host takes guest safety more seriously.

The villa is overall a great place to stay. The grounds are immaculately maintained and give a tranquil vibe to the place. The home easily fit my family of ten with a few guests coming over for meals.
There are only two rooms with air conditioning which is not obvious from the listing. This wouldn't be an issue since B·∫£o L·ªôc is typically cooler in the evenings, but the three rooms without AC didn't have an effective way to bring in fresh air.
Other than the cooling, we loved the home. The hosts are very attentive and generous, the grounds are beautiful, and it's a good value for large groups.
Even knowing what we know now, we would stay again.

Dan‚Äôs home is 3km from Bao Loc central lake. We took a cab there and went straight into the place without any struggle. My team had a wonderful time there, we sang a lot (there is karaoke speaker), slept well, ate well (we followed local store suggestion from owner). Definitely come back if we visit Bao Loc again.

Dan was a wonderful host.
The staff were so welcoming and generous.
They accommodated our early check in as well as greeting us at the door. This villa felt like a resort. Everyone was so inviting, the environment was great, and the service was fantastic. 10/10 would recommend!
